body:
Hi Mostapha,



is it possible on next version you fix the possibility to show component location on tabs when CTRL+ALT + LMB pressed!!!



tag David

replies.body: Hi Mohamed, I wish we could make that happen but there is not that much that we can do about this. This is something that David needs to change in how Grasshopper locates components. Ladybug components are userobjects and are created from a single Python component. Currently when you press CTRL+ALT + LMB Grasshopper identifies them as GHPython components but it can potentially check for Component.SubCategory. The best solution for now is to open the editor and check ghenv.Component.SubCategory [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/jACL*2XH9YkxzD9Fg*xqOLdarPeSnhnMXOZ3n02l299OclojGCmke1pEYZ*OO1oZQkA5ke1abD2uckypiFV4mpCzNkTiu-ps/Subcategory.PNG)
